Stores Meter Readings for one or more devices.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The <b>deviceId</b> Or <b>externalDeviceId</b> should be used along side the <b>readings</b> property for this endpoint to be succesfull.\n<ul>\n <li><b>deviceId</b> is a uuid of the device that is generated by our API after registering a device with a specific provider (i.e Bluemetering)</li>\n <li><b>externalDeviceId</b> is an id of an external device in an external system to our API.</li>\n</ul>\n","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["readings"],"properties":{"deviceId":{"type":"string"},"externalDeviceId":{"type":"string"},"readings":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["obisCode","timestamp","value"],"properties":{"obisCode":{"type":"string"},"timestamp":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"value":{"type":"number","format":"double"}},"title":"NewReading"}}},"title":"NewDeviceReading"}},"example":[{"deviceId":"21b08022-7682-3c0a-b285-96f03ac65b22","externalDeviceId":"123456789ABCD","readings":[{"obisCode":"1.8.0","timestamp":1714635961,"value":10.5}]}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
